column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////2. The ambiance is so lame. When we arrived
column2: we were given a table for two in the main dining room where we were a mere foot away or so from the guests seated at the tables on either side.  We noticed a booth where two people were sitting was emptying out
column3: so we asked if we could sit there. We were told that  that booth was being saved for a larger party (even though all the other booths had just two guests seated in them).  We were offered seats in the basement
column5: as there was more "elbow room."  However
column6: the basement looked like a bar or a pizza parlor
column7: and the lighting was so poor that my husband had to use the light on his cell phone for us to read the menu.
